CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Whispering Willows Estate relative to Ironwood Ranch?
SRP.A: Whispering Willows Estate is {above} Ironwood Ranch in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Ironwood Ranch relative to Whispering Willows Estate?
SRP.A: Ironwood Ranch is {below} Whispering Willows Estate in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total crop yield?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Ironwood Ranch}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total crop yield?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Whispering Willows Estate}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Ironwood Ranch's maximum Crop Yield in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Ironwood Ranch's maximum Crop Yield is in {1987}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Whispering Willows Estate's minimum Crop Yield in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Whispering Willows Estate's minimum Crop Yield is in {1966}.

NC.Q: Between 1968 and 1970, was the average total Crop Yield higher or lower than between 1971 and 1984?
NC.A: The average total crop yield between 1968 and 1970 was {lower} than between 1971 and 1984.

NC.Q: Was the total Crop Yield in 1965 higher or lower than in 1967?
NC.A: The total crop yield in 1965 was {lower} than in 1967.

NC.Q: Was the total Crop Yield in 1984 higher or lower than in 1987?
NC.A: The total crop yield in 1984 was {lower} than in 1987.

NC.Q: Was the total Crop Yield in 1966 higher or lower than in 1981?
NC.A: The total crop yield in 1966 was {lower} than in 1981.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Ironwood Ranch} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Ironwood Ranch and Whispering Willows Estate first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Ironwood Ranch and Whispering Willows Estate first exchanged leading positions in {1966}.
